Reviews.Title: “Reasonable, but many point of improvement”

Reviews.Content: stylish hotel belonging spanish plus location clean breakfast costs 19 euro minus extremely slow reception 10 minutes check person hear neighbours walls bed comfortable pillows empty bags free internet warm combined reasonable

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel girlfriend 4 nights start standard special promo expedia list bad extremely clean modern fantastic service allowed check midday helpful funny english smile told expensive internet front desk computer emails print 14 page document free pretty location 5min walk trains cheap markets nearby quiet bad strange square pillow design comfortable pillow little harder front desk none standard european hotels wireless internet expensive 8 euros hour lots free wifi cafes berlin bring laptop bathroom awkward window bedroom lacking little privacy little tiny 4 star hotel air conditioning quiet warm despite cool outside control windows advertised double bed booking unfortunately 2 singles pushed hard girlfriend cozy split middle dont 4 star hotel exceptional elements thet dissapoint regarding comfort people enjoy stay passed main checklist service location affordability cleanliness flying colours

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, great service, great breakfast, will stay again”
Reviews.Author: monkeykieran
Reviews.Content: friend whom sharing stayed hotel checked mentioned am effect upgraded junior suite nice gesture friendly check friend standard perfectly sufficient spacious ours nicer quiet facing onto internal own kitchen hobs microwave cutlery plates minibar stocked usual internet international tv etc breakfast varied quality fresh serving range hot cold items including usual eggs meats savoury sweet range drinks including satisfaction vitamin drink tablets slight draw didnt bother lovely shower bath seen glass panel bedroom unless purposely averted eyes lied bed look person showering luckily friend comfortbale girlfriend reserved guests bit offputting idea frosted glass perfect hotel fuss perfect location inbetween kreuzberg friedrichshain clean friendly incredibly value definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Had a fantastic time, would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: katieanderson19
Reviews.Content: hotel stayed week boyfriend weekend trip berlin hotel clean service lovely spacious lit bathroom clean beds comfortable heating excellent 3 mini bar isnt expensive stocked everyday contents hotel beside sbahn easily move inout town getting sbahn alexanderplatz meant trouble trams anyway isnt taxi east gallery berlin wall corner fantastic discovery clubs near amazing overall hotel stay defo recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Supergrannieisgreat
Reviews.Content: super modern hotel friendly helpful staff bigger expected upgraded bathroom shower beam bit vulnerable walking station hotel dark negative

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Russell1973
Reviews.Content: nice hotel easy ostbahnhof clean comfotable helpful reception breakfast included 19 euros person bit steep ideally ubahn centre berlin 30 minute plus stroll
